channel.title: Teamwork on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Teamwork on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: 4 Levels of Teamworks
item.description: Focus Level 1: Participate as a team member # Keywords: contribution, problem solving, initiative Situation #1 [18.11.02] Level 2: Foster teamwork # Gives credits and acknowledges contributions and efforts to team effectiveness. Situation #1 [18.11.02] acknowledged Kentâ€™s contributions and effort, and wrote a report to the management in a year. Communicates expectations for teamwork and collaboration. Situation #2 [18.11.02] Setup performance objectives with SMART approach. Involves team members in decision making.
